孊字的基本解释

孊
mǐ
〔孊密〕舒缓，如“行孊孊而妍详。”
古女子人名用字。

孊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǐ］
［《集韻》母被切，上紙，明。］
(1)古代女子名用字。
(2)柔美。

孊字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　孊； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页274第21
【廣韻】文被切【集韻】母被切，?音靡。女字。漢許皇后?孊。　又修孊，婦官名。漢廣川王幸姬望卿，爲修孊夫人，主繒帛。

孊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
孊字的起名意思

古女子人名用字。表示舒缓，如“行孊孊而妍详。”。

Shao
Basic explanation of words
Shao
mǐ
〔孊密〕It is soothing, such as "walking and beautiful."
Ancient women's names used characters.
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [mǐ]
[The mother of "Jiyun" was cut, put on paper, and Ming. ]
(1) Ancient women's names used characters.
(2) Soft and beautiful.
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　孊; Kangxi strokes: 22; Page number: page 274 to 21
[Guangyun] The text is cut [Jiyun] The mother is cut, and the sound is extravagant. Female characters. Queen Han Xu? Shao.　Xiu Shao again, the name of the woman official. Han Guangchuan Wang Xingji Wangqing is the wife of Xiubao, the master of the silk.
Shao

Name meaning
Ancient women's names used characters. It means soothing, such as "walking and beautiful.".
